name: Heist (itch) (Moose)
description:
Play as a robber who wants to steal some cash, only for the cards to stack higher and higher against him as he finds he crossed the wrong people!

Controls
  • Keyboard - WASD to move around, Q to change weapons, and E to reload.
  • Mouse - Use it to aim and left click to use weapons.
Features
  • Created in the Construct 2 game engine.
  • Top down shooter.
  • Mouse/Keyboard support.
  • Easy to learn gameplay.
